item.description:
Our special event cost of $45.00 includes dinner and show 

from the website:

He has been the featured hypnotist on the QE2, Princess, Countess, Sagafjord and Oceanic cruise ships, appearing with Hollywood stars such as Norm Crosby, Steve Allen, Jane Meadows, Barbi Benton, Jim Bailey, Jack Jones, Vic Damone, The Platters, Robert Klein, Phyliss Diller and Robert Vaughan. Jerry has also been the guest star on many television shows such as "Good Day," and "People Are Talking."

On Jan 17, 1999, Jerry Valley was featured on national television on ABC'S "20/20" with John Stossel. The show was filmed at famed Caroline's Comedy club in New York.

He has appeared in several movies with a combination of minor appearances and several speaking roles: "The Out-Of-Towners," with Jack Lemmon and Sandy Dennis, "Ruby," "Jenny's Song," "The Carey Treatment," "House Sitter" and "The Matzeliger Project," “Sonny Waters,” “Second Wind,” “Boys,” and “STD.”   He has also been cast in several television commercials.

Jerry Valley was the recipient of the President's Award and the Rexford L. North award presented to him by the National Guild of Hypnotists (NGH). In 1994, the International Hypnosis Hall of Fame (IHHF) presented Jerry with the first-ever award for Excellence in Stage Hypnosis at ceremonies in Atlantic City.

Mr. Valley's show is amazing, fascinating and classic entertainment.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Jerry Valley - Hypnotist - Angelica's in Middleton - Dinner and Show
